content:
V mnohých prípadoch pomôže opraviť priečinok, - kliknite na priečinok pravým tlačidlom myši a zvoľte "Vlastnosti" a zvoľte "Opraviť priečinok": http://imgbank.cz/images/2014/09/23/Thunderbird_opravit_priecinok.jpg

Potom je nutné ešte "Vykonať údržbu priečinkov".: - Thunderbird - Súbor - Vykonať údržbu priečinkov: http://imgbank.cz/images/2015/08/19/Thunderbird_udrzba_priecinkov.jpg
creator: Ansamb

content: That is controlled from your online gmail account.You can set filter there to set preferences for those messages .
creator: davidsk

content:
Hi, Thunderbird doesn't offer message translations by default.

Please check and see whether your email provider does that or if you enabled an addon in Thunderbird such as https://addons.thunderbird.net/en-us/thunderbird/addon/deepl-selected-text/

If you are not sure how to do that, please check here https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/kb/thunderbird-add-ons-frequently-asked-questions
creator: shopov.bogomil

content: Liberando spazio su disco? (Non prenderla come una battuta, ma se non fornisci maggiori informazioni non è che si possa fare molto; quel messaggio appare di solito quando sul disco del computer scarseggia lo spazio libero, è il tuo caso?)
creator: @next

content: Put your mouse over the heading you want to move and drag left or right. I'm referring to the one-line menu bar directly above the message list pane, e.g., Subject, From, Date.
creator: davidsk

content: You can write a filter for inbox for that sender and move to separate folder.
creator: davidsk
